channel.title: Skill tab
channel.description: Okay, I've added this tutorial to my client: http://www.rne-srvr.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/237804-non-renamed-602-skill-interface.html The problem is the popup text doesn't show up. It shows up in the skills tab, I tried fixing it by adding: [code]class9.contentType = 0; [/code] In the logout method. It made it not show up until you click it. Could someone tell mem how to fix the tooltips?

item.title: Skill tab
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“ags always wins, post:10, topic:381724”]if u need help maybe i can try, i love your server in fact ima go play it right now…
ok i see your problem, you do not have a real skill tab for summoning or construction?[/quote]
Na, I haven’t released my client to my players yet. I’ve been editing it for a while. Go to my website, I posted some pics of the new client\cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill tab
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Jeez, w\e. Alright I just added another skill, but on the last skill next to total lvl, it doesn’t auto-refresh the skill when you gain a lvl, if you relog it refreshes. What should I do to fix this? 317 Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill tab
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I Vain I:

Why do you hard code so much? If you want 602 stuff, use a 602 server?

Cuz I don’t want it People like my 317 I have going on. Also, I just needed to add some skills in the skills tab. I looked everywhere, so that was the only thing I found working. Any fix please?

Read full topic
